name: Xenon (itch) (antaxiom, DeanManring, Mugguy88)
description:
Please set your nickname before playing to submit a time

Xenon is a fast paced platformer that features a possessed vacuum trying to escape a mansion.

Controls:

W - Left

D - Right

Left Click / X - Suck

Credits:

The pixel art is done by friend: Mugguy

The wonderful music is done by Dean of https://www.deanmanringmusic.com/

My apologies, the game is very buggy (-the programmer)

Please report any bugs in the comments so I can fix them after the Jam
